select

from freecms_operlogs
order by ${orderByClause}

update freecms_operlogs set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginName = #{record.loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operTime = #{record.opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{record.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update freecms_operlogs
loginName = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operTime = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
